scenario: In 2024, Bob has wages of $107,967.68. Bob also has an interest in a passive activity which generated a loss of $30,686.18 for the year. Bob has passive income from another source of $26,092.48.
question: Calculate the amount of the passive activity loss that is deductible in 2024 under I.R.C. § 469(a).
answer_explanation: Passive losses are limited to passive income. With $26,092.48 in passive income, only $26,092.48 of the $30,686.18 loss is deductible.
reasoning: Limited passive loss to passive income.
